body: So I purchased Gold again, can anyone rank me up to Emerald? I have the purchase ticket number thing if needed
body_tagged: So I purchased Gold again, can anyone rank me up to Emerald? I have the purchase ticket number thing if needed
title: Ranking up

replies.body: contact a sr mod+ via skype. You can find their skype on their profiles.
replies.body_tagged: contact a sr mod+ via skype. You can find their skype on their profiles.

replies.body: Actually, the way to rank up to Emerald from Gold would be to purchase Emerald. When you actually go in to purchase, $25 (your gold rank) will be taken of off the price. But yeah, as res said, email support, or contact the Sr. Staff in some other way.
replies.body_tagged: Actually, the way to rank up to Emerald from Gold would be to purchase Emerald. When you actually go in to purchase, $25 (your gold rank) will be taken of off the price. But yeah, as res said, email support, or contact the Sr. Staff in some other way.

replies.body: I don't follow your logic. You pay $25 to go from gold to emerald when you already have gold, correct? Why did it change?
replies.body_tagged: I don't follow your logic. You pay $25 to go from gold to emerald when you already have gold, correct? Why did it change?

replies.body: It didn't change... But the way to do that is not by purchasing gold again. You purchase Emerald, but it will cost only $25
